head.title: R3D - 3D Printing Santiago Chile
head.description: Company specialized in 3D printing and 3D design services. We offer corporate gifts, models, engineering parts and much more.

header.title: 3D Printing Santiago
header.subtitle: We are a Belgian-Chilean company specialized in 3D printing

design_introduction.text: You have an idea or a project? But you don't know how to make your design in 3D? We design it for you! Afterwards you can print it or use it for other uses.

design_how.title: How do we design?
design_how.scratch_text3: . Based on your instructions we make the design.
design_how.logo_text1: We can also make a 3D design from a 2D image. It can be a logo, an image or a text. Do not hesitate to
design_how.logo_text2: and tell us about your project.

printing_intro.text1: We are experts in 3D printing by Fusel Model Deposition. This technology allows us to reconstruct any geometric form, layer by layer, starting from a 3D model.
printing_intro.text2: You already know what we are talking about? Quote your project

printing_limitations.title: What can be 3D printed?
printing_limitations.intro: Were are specialized in 3D printing using Fused Model Deposition (FDM). Here you have a summary of what can and what cannot be done.
printing_limitations.materials_text: We mostly use plastic PLA which is made up from plants (biodegradable) and also generates very fine prints. ABS, which is a more traditional plastic, is used when one requires pieces with greater mechanical resistance or resistance to temperature. If your project needs something more special, we also have a great variety of other materials: imitation wood, imitation metal, flexible material etc.
printing_limitations.color_text: PLA and ABS are available in a wide variety of colors: white, black, red, orange, yellow, green, blue, violet, brown.
printing_limitations.size_text: Our printers can print up to 25 x 21 x 20 cm. For bigger things, it can be done in separate parts.
printing_limitations.price_text: The price is calculated from the 3D model. We use a program that estimates the weight of the piece and we charge per gram. The larger the piece, the more it will weigh and the greater its cost.

printing_tutorial.title: How to 3D print?
printing_tutorial.intro: 3D Printing with us is very easy and can be done in 3 steps
printing_tutorial.file_text1: The file can be from STL or OBJ format. You can get it from any 3D design program. You don´t know how to design in 3D or don´t have time? We offer
printing_tutorial.file_text2: You can also find many designs on the Internet. The site
printing_tutorial.file_text3: for example already has millions of designs that can be downloaded for free.
printing_tutorial.quote_text2: You can send us the design by mail and we will reply soon with a quote.
printing_tutorial.delivery_text1: You can get your piece by coming to
printing_tutorial.delivery_text2: or we also offer delivery option. The price depends on the shipping region.

our_projects.title: Casino Viña del Mar
our_projects.text: Design and 3D printing of 30 mini-casinos for marketing uses.

our_projects.title: Keychains
our_projects.text: Solcor delivers his brand image with these key chains.

our_projects.title: Lego Pieces
our_projects.text: For a Ted Talk in Renca, to be a gift for his participants.

our_projects.title: Pendrives
our_projects.text: We designed and 3D printed these special bottle-like USB keys for the Distonia Fundation.

our_projects.title: Containers
our_projects.text: The containers floors are made from a filament that contains real wood.

our_projects.title: Mini Entel Towers
our_projects.text: We designed and 3D printed the Entel Towers of Melon's marketing campaign on the social networks.

our_projects.title: National Stadium
our_projects.text: Design & print of Chilean National Stadium for Moovshake company.

our_projects.title: Husky
our_projects.text: The Husky robot of the Universidad de Chile has its sensors mounted thanks to R3D's printed parts.

our_projects.title: Ragnar Lothbrok
our_projects.text: 3D print and painting of a bust of Ragnar. One of the main characters of the series 'Vikings'.

our_projects.title: Masks
our_projects.text: For a private party, with the Venecian Carnaval theme.

our_projects.title: Tyrion Lanister
our_projects.text: Reward for the Nerd Night's raffle organized by the House of Goethe

footer.description: 3D Printing services and development of engineering projects.
